pr_title: Updated azure spring data cosmos group id and artifact id

timeline.message: Updated azure spring data cosmos group id and artifact id

timeline.bodyText: nit: Please put this alphabetically in the file. With the groupId change this should go in between com.azure:azure-sdk-template and com.azure:azure-storage-blob
timeline.author: JimSuplizio

timeline.bodyText: With the artifact changing the safe name would be azurespringdatacosmos. The ci.yml apparently already has this change.
timeline.author: JimSuplizio
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -251,8 +251,8 @@ jobs:
         TestName: Integration_Test_Spring_Data_Cosmosdb
         ServiceDirectory: cosmos
         Artifacts:
-            - name: spring-data-cosmosdb
-              groupId: com.microsoft.azure
+            - name: azure-spring-data-cosmos
+              groupId: com.azure

timeline.message: Sorted version client to alphabetical list
Merged latest master and resolved conflicts
Fixed tests.yml with new safename for azure spring data cosmos
Increasing timeout for cosmos emulator builds since download step takes most of the time

timeline.bodyText:
Please include a comment explaining that the timeout is extended because the Cosmos Emulator takes a very long time to download and link this bug: #12970
A glance through download times for Cosmos DB in Python and JS hosts shows that the download step is taking a very long time compared to Java. It's not clear why this is the case. The bug above is tracking this.
timeline.author: danieljurek

replies.bodyText:
Thanks for creating the issue @danieljurek
I have added the comment in this PR .
replies.author: kushagraThapar

timeline.message: Added comments for increasing the timeout value
